definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: a kind of cake (prob. as perforated, v. Di Le 2:4)—´[[ח]] abs. Nu 15:20, Le 24:5; cstr. [[חַלַּת]] Ex 29:23 + 4 t.; pl. [[חַלּוֹת]] Le 2:4 + 2 t.; [[חַלּֽת]] Ex 29:2 + 3 t.—used in offerings:
at the sacrif. of David on removal of ark, given to each person as part of peace-offering 2Sa 6:19.
